    • findHighestStressedValueIndex

      public int findHighestStressedValueIndex(int finalIndex, int index)
      Compares two phoneme from the listOfPhoneme stress value.
      Parameters:
      finalIndex - within the listOfPhoneme which is the current finals stressed vowel index.
      index - within the listOfPhoneme which is a vowel.
      Returns:
      the index that contains the highest stress value with priority to finalIndex.

    • getStressValueFromIndex

      Parameters:

      Returns:

    • rhymesWith

      public boolean rhymesWith(IPronunciation other)
      Checks if the current pronunciation rhymes with the other pronunciation.
      Specified by:
      rhymesWith in interface IPronunciation
      Parameters:
      other - to have access to the other pronunciation object.
      Returns:
      true if the current listOfPhonemes matches with other pronunciation listOfPhonemes.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - passed pronunciation cannot be null.

    • getPhonemeFromIndex

    • isSoundsAfterFinalStressedVowelSame

      public boolean isSoundsAfterFinalStressedVowelSame(int finalStressedIndex, int otherFinalStressedIndex, List<IPhoneme> otherListOfPhoneme)
      Checks if the sounds after both finals stressed vowels are the same.
      Parameters:
      finalStressedIndex - is the index of the current listOfPhonemes final stressed index.
      otherFinalStressedIndex - is the index of the other listOfPhonemes final stressed index.
      otherListOfPhoneme - in order to have access to the other pronunciation listOfPhonemes.
      Returns:
      true if both pronunciation listOfPhonemes rhymes, else return false.
